item.title: Trump kicks off Thanksgiving week with turkey pardon and Christmas tree arrival
item.description: Trump kicks off Thanksgiving week with traditional White House turkey pardon ceremony. First lady asks public to vote on turkey names via social media...

item.title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene slaps down notion that she's eyeing a presidential run
item.description: GOP Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, who plans to leave office early next year, shot down the notion that she's eyeing a White House bid

item.title: Top military leaders head to Puerto Rico to thank troops supporting Caribbean missions
item.description: Pentagon leaders to visit Puerto Rico troops amid expanded Caribbean operations targeting drug networks and regional security missions across Latin Am...

item.title: Rubio claims 'tremendous amount of progress' in Ukraine peace talks following Geneva meeting
item.description: Marco Rubio says Ukraine war discussions have entered productive phase as negotiators refine comprehensive peace plan covering ceasefire and settlemen...

item.title: Trump claims GOP has 'never been so united,' calls Greene and other Republicans 'lowlifes'
item.description: Trump claimed that the Republican Party is "so UNITED" and called Marjorie Taylor Greene a "Traitor" in a recent Truth Social post.
